Install Star Schedule Demo

Zaturn: Data Analysis With Vibes

Your open source, AI-powered data analysis co-pilot

Just Chat With Your Data! No SQL, No Python.

Zaturn provides tools that enable AI models to run SQL, so you don't have to.

Skip The Interface, Get Straight To Insights.

Overwhelmed by eyecandy dashboards? Tired of clicking filters and sorts? With Zaturn, you can ask your AI what you need, and you will get straight to it.

E.g.: "Hey AI, here's my sales data from the last quarter, suggest some directions for this quarter."

Supported Data Sources

  • Clickhouse
  • CSV
  • DuckDB
  • MySQL
  • Parquet
  • PostgresQL
  • SQLite

Ready To Try It?

Zaturn runs locally on your PC, with a studio interface or as an MCP for AI clients that support the protocol. With the studio interface, you need to connect your own LLM API.

Install the Zaturn package to get started!
